title: Return of the Baron
author: verias
text:
Hidden Name: Mnerillenith

Wooha, and we see what Ruby's been up to since Chapter 4 ended. Sentry to Circe's door? Maybe she snuck back there when the power went out. Who knows.

Don't forget to pop on over to Patreon and check out Silver City. Page 3 is now live at http://www.patreon.com/creation?hid=910626&rf=2442...

See you on Monday!

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: Something tells me Baron's gonna regret pulling that sword on Circe

replies.author: Musical_life*Guest*
replies.text: Circe would at least know martial arts if not Kinjutsu.
